text: ai nabee apanee beeviyon aur apanee ladakiyon aur momineen kee auraton se kah do ki (baahar nikalate vakt) apane (cheharon aur gardanon) par apanee chaadaron ka ghoonghat lataka liya karen ye unakee (sharaafat kee) pahachaan ke vaaste bahut munaasib hai to unhen koee chhedega nahin aur khuda to bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai
